metadata.name: Valentines Web 3
metadata.description:
There is an endless connection between us. You can make that connection infinitely happy!  
The art of giving is a timeless tradition that holds immense power and significance in our lives. Our gift NFT embodies the spirit of this timeless tradition, and it represents a special moment for you to show appreciation, gratitude, and fondness towards those who matter most to you.

In this digital age, we want to bring the art of giving to the web3 space, where you can send this gift NFT as a token of your love, friendship, or support. Whether you are sending it to a friend, a loved one, or a cherished member of a web3 project, this gift NFT will be treasured and remembered for years to come.

As they receive the gift NFT, they will be pleasantly surprised with a special art piece, a beautiful reminder of your love, friendship, or support. This special art piece will be airdropped to the gift NFT holderâ€™s wallet around February 10th, in celebration of Valentine's Day.

So go ahead, mint this gift NFT and send it to those who matter most to you. It will be a moment that they will cherish forever.

With love and appreciation, Oleski

The artists of the #ValentineWeb3
